content: The monk will suggest "why not worship around with true hearts, for Buddhas may light your path", but what he really means is **four** Buddha.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
The monk will suggest "why not worship around with true hearts, for Buddhas may light your path", but what he really means is **four** Buddha.
